attributes.action: Should the government enforce The Freedom of Information act on The Football Association
attributes.additional_details:
After watching about drugs in and around football. I was surprised to see that The F.A can just deny to give out information regarding how many drug tests they perform each year. Each question that was asked was just given a straight no answer.

As the governing body of what I would say was our national sport, it pains me to learn that we are not allowed to know what secrets are being kept behind those doors at Soho Square.

Please sign my petition and let's hear some truth!
